data.name: Geocaching.com - Dark Theme
data.description:
A dark theme for the Geocaching.com website, as well as a few other related websites (GeoCheck.org and GeoChecker.com).  Colors are changeable via the variables set on :root.

Any issues?  Additional websites to add?  Want to check out my other dark theme styles?  Let me know by contacting me through my social media (and please provide a screenshot if possible): https://www.queengoob.org/darkthemes

data.name: messages
Wikipedia - Dark Theme
data.description:
A dark theme for Amazon.  Colors are adjustable via the variables set on :root.

Style was derived from #122072.  Updated for better compatibility and usage of variables rather than just colors, as well as restoring the original logo.

Any issues?  Code changes you'd like to submit?  Additional websites to add?  Want to check out my other dark theme styles?  Let me know by contacting me through my social media (and please provide a screenshot if possible): https://www.queengoob.org/darkthemes

data.name: Crangle Law Firm
data.description: To handle legal issues of the workstation, make sure you are backed up by a reliable and professional employment law attorney in Toronto.

user.name: CrangleLaw Firm
user.about:
To handle legal issues of the workstation, make sure you are backed up by a reliable and professional employment law attorney in Toronto. Consult your matter with one of the best employment law firms, Crangle law. Our office has years of experience in resolving complex workstation cases with a result-driven approach. Call us now!

Address:
197 Spadina Ave, Suite 400
Toronto, Ontario M5T 2C8
Mob- 416 663 7285
Email-aaron@cranglelawfirm.com

Working Hours: 
Monday	        9 am‚Äì5 pm
Tuesday	        9 am‚Äì5 pm
Wednesday	        9 am‚Äì5 pm
Thursday	        9 am‚Äì5 pm
Friday	                    9 am‚Äì5 pm
Saturday	             Closed
Sunday	             Closed
